rocks.bastion.core.resource

Class InvalidResourceException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • rocks.bastion.core.resource.InvalidResourceException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResourceNotFoundException, UnreadableResourceException

    public class InvalidResourceException
extends RuntimeException
    Thrown by the resource loader by the specified resource is invalid. Typically, subclasses of this exception will be thrown.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InvalidResourceException(String message, String source)
      Constructs an instance of this exception given the descriptive error message to display and the source path which the ResourceLoader tried to load.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getSource()
      Gets the source patch which the ResourceLoader tried to load when throwing this exception.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Throwable

        addSuppressed, fillInStackTrace, getCause, getLocalizedMessage, getMessage, getStackTrace, getSuppressed, initCause, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, printStackTrace, setStackTrace, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • InvalidResourceException

        public InvalidResourceException(String message,
                                String source)
        Constructs an instance of this exception given the descriptive error message to display and the source path which the ResourceLoader tried to load.
        Parameters:
        message - The error message describing the issue.
        source - The path supplied by the user which could not be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • getSource

        public String getSource()
        Gets the source patch which the ResourceLoader tried to load when throwing this exception.
        Returns:
        The user-supplied source path to load.
